import { useContext } from "react" import CartContext from "../../context/CartContext" import classes from "./Cart.module.css" import Modal from "./Modal" import Input from "../UI/Input" const Cart = (props)=>{ const clickHAndler = (event)=>{ console.log(event) } const cartContext = useContext(CartContext) const cartItems =
    {cartContext.meals.map((item)=>{ return

  • {item.name}

    {item.price}

    • })}
return {cartItems}
Amount ${cartContext.total.toFixed(2)}
} export default Cart
